alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 9:05PM CDT until May 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 905 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hershey, or 10 miles west of North Platte, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Coker, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 157 and 173. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
